overview: This file controls the creation of Rune Words and their various modifiers.  Any column field name starting with “*” is considered a comment field and is not used by the game

data_fields.name: Name
data_fields.description: Controls the string key that is used to the display the name of the item when the Rune Word is complete

data_fields.name: complete
data_fields.description: Boolean field. If equals 1, then the Rune Word can be crafted in-game. If equals 0, then the Rune Word cannot be crafted in-game.

data_fields.name: firstLadderSeason
data_fields.description: Integer field. The first ladder season the Rune Word can be made on (inclusive). If blank or 0 then it is available in non-ladder.

data_fields.name: lastLadderSeason
data_fields.description: Integer field. The last ladder season the Rune Word is ladder-only (inclusive). Must be used in conjunction with firstLadderSeason.

data_fields.name: itype1 (to itype6)
data_fields.description: Controls what item types are allowed for this Rune Word (Uses the ID field from ItemTypes.txt)

data_fields.name: etype1 (to etype3)
data_fields.description: Controls what item types are excluded for this Rune Word (Uses the ID field from ItemTypes.txt)

data_fields.name: Rune1 (to Rune6)
data_fields.description: Controls what runes are required to make the Rune Word. The order of each of these fields matters. (Uses the ID field from misc.txt)

data_fields.name: T1Code1 (to T1Code7)
data_fields.description: Controls the item properties that the Rune Word provides (Uses the “code” field from Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: T1Param1 (to T1Param7)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “parameter” value associated with the related property (T1Code). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: T1Min1 (to T1Min7)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “min” value to assign to the related property (T1Code). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)

data_fields.name: T1Max1 (to T1Max7)
data_fields.description: The stat’s “max” value to assign to the related property (T1Code). Usage depends on the property function (See the “func” field on Properties.txt)
